Type: Mineral
Class: Silicate
Subclass: Sorosilicate
Particle Size: Fine
Sample No.: SS-1A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VSWIR
Origin: Mexico, Baja California Norte, Valle De La Trinidad
Collection Date: N/A
Description: Particle size was 0-45um.Collected by Burminco Original ASTER Spectral Library name was jpl.beckman.mineral.silicate.sorosilicate.fine.ss01a.spectrum.txt

Second Column: Y

Y Units:Reflectance (percent)

Last X Value:  2.5000
Number of X Values: 826
